title.rendered: Doctoral, Graduate, and Undergraduate Commencement Lists

content.rendered:
This page will contain lists of students who are cleared to participate in the upcoming Class of 2024 commencement ceremonies on Saturday, May 25, 2024.   The lists will be posted on Friday, March 1, 2024 and will be updated every Friday until commencement day.

Note: If your name does not appear on the Graduation List and you recently submitted your Application for Graduation and/or payment, your application and clearance may still be in process. The list will be updated every Friday.  Students whose name appears on a Class of 2024 Graduation List are eligible to participate in the Class of 2024 commencement ceremonies.

CLASS OF 2024 Cleared Lists

The following lists are alphabetized by last name.

  • Doctoral List
  • Juris Doctor List
  • Graduate List
  • Undergraduate List

Please reach out to the following contacts if you have questions about being or getting cleared:

La Verne Campus Graduate Students
Office of Graduate Services
 (909) 448-4011 gas@laverne.edu
La Verne Campus Traditional Undergraduate Students
Office of Academic Support and Retention		 (909) 448-4581 advising@laverne.edu
CAPA Undergraduate Students (909) 448-4151 capa@laverne.edu
La Verne Online (909) 448-4086 laverneonline@laverne.edu
Bakersfield (661) 861-6800 bakersfield@laverne.edu
Burbank (818) 295-6500 sfvc@laverne.edu
Irvine (714) 505-6936 occ@laverne.edu
Ontario (909) 937-6985 iec@laverne.edu
Naval Base Ventura County (805) 986-6900 pt.mugu@laverne.edu
Vandenberg Space Force Base (805) 986-6900 pt.mugu@laverne.edu
